content: Which Shakespearean play features the characters Macduff, Banquo, and Lady Macbeth?

The Shakespearean play that features the characters Macduff, Banquo, and Lady Macbeth is "Macbeth." This tragedy revolves around the ambitious Macbeth, who, influenced by his wife Lady Macbeth, commits regicide to become king. Macduff plays a crucial role as an antagonist to Macbeth, while Banquo is a nobleman whose ghost haunts Macbeth.
